pages.text: Alloys are created by mixing various resources. Alloys are created on a percentage basis. Exact percentages are outlined in the respective entries, and they are auto calculated in the $(l:metallurgy/machines/alloy_furnace)Alloy Furnace$(). Different resources exist with varying levels of material worth.

pages.title: Copper
pages.text: Suitable materials for alloying with copper include: $(li)$(l:elements/29_copper)Copper Nuggets$() $(li2)Material weight: 1 $(li)$(l:elements/29_copper)Copper Ingots$() $(li2)Material weight: 9 $(li)$(l:elements/29_copper)Copper Blocks$() $(li2)Material weight: 81
